    • About


    As a third generation, family-owned and operated real estate company, Colemere Realty Associates has a long history of working for the success of our clients. Each member of our team is focused on providing the expertise of 3 generations in the business. We know that a real estate transaction can be very challenging which is why achieving your satisfaction is our top priority. As your REALTORSÂ®, we are committed to your success in the purchase and sale of your home, and we promise you the full support, experience, and expertise of our team.
